description:
Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files. 
	Aspose.Email makes it easy to work with HTML or plain text emails and their attachments. It allows developers to work against SMTP, POP, FTP and Microsoft Exchange servers. It supports mail merge and iCalendar features, customized header and body, retrieving content, header information and embedded files and much more.
releaseNotes:
New Features
NETWORKNET-33227 	Appointment.SetTimeZone() now accepts an instance of TimeZoneInfo
NETWORKNET-20787 	Supported creation of TNEF message
NETWORKNET-33193	Added a property in MapiMessage class to detect the Outlook message type

Enhancements 
NETWORKNET-33194	Enhanced the component to retain the Sender Address formaat if it is not in Smtp format
NETWORKNET-33191	MHT format can now include Email headers as well as Embedded images
NETWORKNET-33237	Updated links in Offline Documentation

Bug Fixes
NETWORKNET-33249	Embedded images appear as regular attachments when processed by Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33243	Saving mail message as .msg file corrupts original attachment file name
NETWORKNET-33234	Appointment request when received, adds an hour to start and end times
NETWORKNET-33233	Setting the Appointment Time Zone to "America/New_York" adds an hour to time
NETWORKNET-33232	NullReferenceException: When adding messages to PST
NETWORKNET-33222	FormatException: "The specified content type is invalid" at MailMessage.Load
NETWORKNET-33221	Aspose.Email.FileCorruptedException: at MapiMessage.Save
NETWORKNET-33219	Attachment has empty LongFileName, FileName and Extension when using MapiMessage
NETWORKNET-33216	Cannot extract nested attachments
NETWORKNET-33208	Encoding problem when converting from EML to MSG
NETWORKNET-33206	ArgumentException: Offset and length were out of bounds.. MapiMessage.BodyHtml
NETWORKNET-33205	ArgumentException: Email address is not valid - MapiMessage.ToMapiMessageItem()
NETWORKNET-33202	Outlook cannot open the message after deleting regular attachments
NETWORKNET-33198	EML: Sent date is set to None
NETWORKNET-33192	Encoding problem when converting from MSG to MHT
NETWORKNET-33207	Content-Type: image/pdf vs application/pdf
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within .NET applications
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
